sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./BookingForm" export const Requests = () => { const [requests, setRequest] = useState([]) useEffect( () => { fetch(`http://localhost:8088/requests`) .then(response => response.json()) .then((requestInfo) => { setRequest(requestInfo) }) }, [] ) return (<>
{requests.length ?

My Request

{requests.map(request => { return (<>
Band Name: {request.bandName}
Phone Number: {request.phoneNumber}
Start Date: {request.startDate}
End Date: {request.endDate}
No. of Songs: {request.numOfSongs}
Genre: {request?.genre?.type}
Musicians: {request.musicianRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Session Musicians: {request.sessionMusicians === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Photos: {request.photoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
Video Request: {request.videoRequest === true ?
Yes
:
No
}
/
{deleteButton()}
) })}
:
NO REQUESTS...
}
) }
